page.title: 13FISHING
page.content: YESTERDAY WE WENT TO SEE SOME BOATS.THE{BOATS}ARE CALLED COBLES.WE SAW THREE OF THEM.THE COBLES ARE 10 METRES LONG.THE{COBLES}HAVE A SPEED OF 7 TO 8 KNOTS.TWO MEN CAN GO IN THE BOAT AT ONE TIME.MRS ROBINSON WHO IS A FISHERMAN WIFE SHOWED AROUND. AFTER WE HAD SEEN THE COBLES WE WENT TO MRS ROBINSON'S HOUSE.WE SAW SOME COD{NETS {MADE OF NYLON.WE ALSO}SAW OME CRAB POTS WHICH ARE MADE BY THE FISHERMAN. THE SALMON NETS ARE CALLED MONOFILAMENT NETS AND HAVE LEAD ON THE BOTTOM TO HOLD THEM VERTICAL.YOU MUST HAVE A LICENCE FOR SALMON FISHING THE{ {SALMON}SEASON STARTS THE 26TH OF MARCH AND ENDS THE 31ST OF AUGUST.THE LOBSTERS HAVE TO BE 85MMS LONG BEFORE THEY CAN BE SOLD.
